message:
Remove greeting comment feature

Remove the automatic greeting comment that appeared when users selected
their daily emotional state. This simplifies the UX and reduces noise.

Changes:
- Remove greeting field from UserState interface
- Remove greeting text from default state configs
- Remove greeting comment creation logic in handleStateChoose
- Remove greeting comment rendering at top of editor
